author: doogie
msg: In getIndexInfo, moved the lookupSchemaName calculation outside of the loop, as there is no way it could change at runtime.

author: doogie
msg: Refactored several getConnection() calls; if the caller added an error message, then it got refactored.

author: doogie
msg: Add new variants of makeHavingWhereString that take a StringBuilder, and deprecate the old versions that don't.

msg: Add new variants of makeConditionWhereString that take a StringBuilder, and deprecate the old versions that don't.

author: doogie
msg: Add new variants of makeWhereStringFromFields that take a StringBuilder, and deprecate the old versions that don't.
